channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Which 2023 vintage wines should you buy? A trip through Bordeaux's vineyards
item.description: Should you buy now? The short answer is yes—if the price is right. But pick carefully.

item.title: The rule capping credit card late fees at $8 is on hold — here’s what it means for you
item.description: The outcome preserves, at least for now, a key revenue stream for the U.S. card industry. The CFPB said the rule would've saved Americans $10 billion a year.

item.title: Fitness influencer gets candid out about having stage 4 colon cancer
item.description: "I want to create awareness that it can happen to anyone," says Maria Kang, 43.

item.title: Wall Street expects rate hikes are off the table. Next week’s inflation data will test that thesis
item.description: A reading that comes in line with expectations could signal further upside ahead for stocks, while a significantly hotter print could spook investors.

item.title: Financial stress is making us mentally and physically ill. Here’s how to cope
item.description: The latest research on the connection between money and the mind finds our finances even take a toll on our physical health. It’s a vicious cycle.

item.title: McDonald’s is working to introduce a $5 value meal
item.description: The potential new offering comes at a time when low-income consumers are beginning to pull back on spending, particularly at fast-food brands.

item.title: One of the most shorted stocks on the market just leapt 99%, putting a ‘rib-crunching’ squeeze on bearish bettors
item.description: Friday’s stock surge delivered paper losses of about $255 million to short sellers, according to data from S3 Partners LLC.

item.title: FanDuel parent Flutter may spur investor interest by moving primary exchange listing
item.description: Flutter could benefit from a change in investor attention once it finalizes a switch to the New York Stock Exchange, according to UBS.

item.title: Flavor Flav is the official hype man for the US women's water polo team in the Paris Olympics
item.description: “One thing about me, I know what it feels like to want to see a dream come true,” Flavor Flav said.

item.title: Jim Simons, billionaire quantitative investing pioneer who generated eye-popping returns, dies at 86
item.description: Jim Simons, a legendary mathematician who founded quantitative hedge fund Renaissance Technologies, passed away on Friday.
